content: कर्षण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dragging. {@--2@} Injuring. {@--3@} Extending (in time), see below. --णं [कृष् भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Drawing, dragging, pulling, bending (as of a bow); भज्यमानमतिमात्रकर्षणात् <ls>R. 11. 46</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Attracting. {@--3@} Ploughing, tilling. {@--4@} Injuring, tormenting; emaciation; <ls>Ms. 7. 112.</ls> {@--5@} Cultivated land.
